contents:
To sign up for a free account, you will need an invitation code.

In order to get a code, you can:

– Request a code from one of your CTemplar contacts who has a paid account
– Send a message to our team: invite-codes@ctemplar.com
– Contact us on social media


1.付款用户有资格发送邀请码
2.发送邮件invite-codes@ctemplar.com直接要
3.到他们的社交媒体上问他们直接要邀请码即可
